name: Peroni Lager
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: Italy's #1 beer from Birra Peroni, founded 1846 in Rome. The iconic blue label served in every trattoria from Milan to Sicily.

name: Jack's Abby Copper Legend, Oktoberfest Lager

name: "Pulp Daddy" Imperial IPA by Greater Good
serverNotes:
üç∫ ABOUT: Bold Imperial IPA (Double IPA) from Greater Good Brewing in Worcester, MA. Local brewery supporting the community!

üçä STYLE: Hazy Imperial IPA | 8% ABV, 80+ IBU | Intense hop character with citrus, mango, pineapple & tropical fruit | Generously dry-hopped for maximum aroma | Full body with warming alcohol.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Spicy buffalo wings, jalape√±o burgers, Korean BBQ, aged cheddar, spicy Thai, IPA cheddar soup. Strong flavors that stand up to the hops!

üí° SERVING TIP: 13 oz pour (not a full pint due to higher ABV). Serve cold (40-45¬∞F). For serious IPA lovers‚Äîthis is hop heaven!

name: "Lunch Car" by Double Down
description: West Coast IPA, Worcester, MA, 6.5% ABV
serverNotes:
üåÖ üìñ ABOUT: Classic West Coast IPA from Double Down Brewing in Worcester, MA. Named after Worcester's famous lunch car diner culture. Local craft supporting the community!

üçä STYLE: West Coast IPA | 6.5% ABV, 65 IBU | Assertive pine resin, ruby red grapefruit & citrus zest | Crisp, clean, dry finish | Clear appearance (not hazy) | Lighter body lets hop character shine.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Bacon cheeseburgers, crispy fried chicken, pepperoni pizza, buffalo wings. The bitterness cuts through fat beautifully!

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve cold (40-45¬∞F) in an IPA glass. Traditional IPA for fans who want clarity and bite. West Coast pride in Central Mass!
